front.title: Network-Hexagons, an H3-LISP Based Mobility Network

abstract.t: This document specifies combined use of H3 and LISP for mobility-networks: - Enabling real-time tile-by-tile localized-annotation of road-conditions - Sharing of road annotations: hazards, blockages, maintenance, furniture - Between MobilityClients producing and consuming road-state information - Using in-network tile-state addressable-indexed-maintained in H3Servers.
